data.content:
verb
or shmooze schmoozes or shmoozes; schmoozed or shmoozed; schmoozing or shmoozing
informal :to talk with someone in a friendly way often in order to get some advantage for yourself [no obj]
People will have time to schmooze during the cocktail hour. - often + with
She schmoozed with the reporters/boss. [+ obj]
He schmoozed his teachers.
